name: When You Wish Upon A Star (Taylin Swift)
name_original: When You Wish Upon A Star (Taylin Swift)
description:
FULL SCREEN to play around the board.
It is real-time-based pathfinding. 
The star chaser has 50 stamina, one step/move/grid costs 1 stamina, when the stamina runs out, the star chaser will go for the planets(stamina) first.
